title: "Up 205% Since IPO, Why Generative AI Could Boost Datadog Stock"
excerpt: "Datadog is one of a few companies able to quantify how much Generative AI is contributing to growth. As Pomel told analysts during a conference call, “AI-native customers” contributed 2.5% of Datadog’s annualized revenue during the quarter, CNBC reported."
